title: Executive Order 6404-Oil-Shale Restoration No. 2, Nevada
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910 (ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497), so much of Executive order of September 28, 1918, creating Oil-Shale Reserve No. 1, Nevada No. 1, as affects the lands hereinafter described is hereby revoked:
T. 34 N., R. 56 E., sec. 19, lots 1, 2, and 3.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6404-Oil-Shale Restoration No. 2, Nevada Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362228
